tag_narrative: Promote peaceful and inclusive societies for sustainable development, provide access to justice for all and build effective, accountable and inclusive institutions at all levels
Significantly reduce all forms of violence and related death rates everywhere
title_narrative: Assisting stabilization and humanitarian efforts with Explosive Hazard Management to enable civilians to return to retaken areas
Iniziativa per la gestione dei rischi di ordigni esplosivi per facilitare il ritorno dei civili in Iraq
sector_narrative: Removal of land mines and explosive remnants of war
description_narrative: The present initiative has the overall objective to assist stabilization efforts in areas previously under Da’esh occupation, and to create conditions for the sustainable return of displaced people through humanitarian mine action activities. This will reduce the risks posed by explosive hazards in direct support of stabilization, humanitarian planning and aid delivery. The geographical focus of the explosive hazard management and risk education activities will be Ninewa Province and other areas affected by the conflict in Mosul.

L'iniziativa intende sostenere la gestione dei rischi di ordigni esplosivi a supporto del processo di stabilizzazione e dell’impegno umanitario per facilitare il ritorno dei civili nelle aree liberate dall’occupazione dell’ISIS del governatorato di Ninive in Iraq, attraverso interventi di sminamento e attività di mine risk education
